name: dYdX.trade
description: The dYdX Chain is an independent blockchain built on the Cosmos SDK and utilizes the Tendermint Proof-of-stake consensus protocol. It offers a completely decentralized, off-chain orderbook and matching engine, designed to handle significantly higher throughput than traditional blockchain technologies.

name: Datalenses.zone
description: Datalenses.zone is designed to index data from various Cosmos SDK chains, providing a user-friendly interface that makes data accessible via SQL.

name: Stride
description: Liquid staking for the Cosmos. Enables you to transfer, trade, and borrow against your tokens - without missing any staking rewards.

name: pSTAKE Finance
description: pSTAKE is a Cosmos-focused liquid staking (LST issuance) protocol built on Persistence One. pSTAKE empowers users to earn staking rewards and participate in DeFi while maintaining liquidity with stkTokens.

name: Coinhall
description: The Interchain Trading and Rewards Hub

name: Melaverde
description: Mela Verde is a proprietary trading firm specializing in market-making in the digital asset class.

name: Ravendao
description: iquidity across multiple blockchains, DeFi protocols (exchanges, bridges, RFQ systems) and centralized exchanges, to make fair and efficient markets across many different crypto assets.

name: dydx-migration.mintscan.io
description: This dApp facilitates the migration of DYDX tokens from Ethereum to the dYdX Chain, enabling token holders to secure the network and earn staking rewards derived from the exchange's trading fees.
